body: He could always have the shrine moved to some other plot of land lol.
When someone says hentai has no plot send them this.
God damn, I can't understand the plot of some of Fumi's doujins unless I read someone explaining what's going on in the comments.

here's a solution to problem of the shrine being demolished if he has enough money rent a heavy duty lifting helicopter, lift the shrine to the a safe ground were construction is banned (or to were he is living) and with the money left over rehabilitate the shrine and live with her happy ever after
If she cums, is not rape.

Just a thought... If she's a Goddess bound to the Shrine, shouldn't there be an Ornament that she's really bound to and not the whole Shrine? So if he found her Ornament, he should be able to bring her with him...

@Stck She's implied to be a Shinto Goddess/ Spirit bound to her Shrine. She was always in love with him, but she knows a human and a Goddess can not be in love (or at least, in a healthy way) so she sent him away and sealed away her feelings. Years later, he returns, seeking her after hearing that her Shrine is about to be demolished (which means she will die with it). She's definitely still love him, but she knows she's about to die, so that's why she was trying to push him away, both consciously and subconsciously. That entire 'logic' section was simply her revealing her true feelings.

Bruh wtf is her logic. "Go away it was a mistake" "why didnt you come find me?" "Glad I got to see you before the end" 

Sounds like they couldve had a sweet love story is she wasnt a dramatic dumbass. And why is it the end anyway?
I'm here to fap and not to feel.
They live happily ever after :D let's end it like that guys
bittersweet love stories are nice sometimes.
mmm. Spirit/deity attached to that small and old dojo/house that will banish once it's being taken down? Give me eternal loves not sad things. FeelsBadMan.
